name: Loop Plant
description:
Discription

You in the role of an amateur gardener must grow a flower to sell it. And buy what you dream about the most. There are several important indicators for growth: water, soil (nutrients), light and temperature. Each plant has its own requirements. If you do not follow them, your flower will die.

The main idea of the game is the cyclicity of life, we hope you enjoy our game. 😁

How to play?
  1. To plant a plant, drag the seeds onto the pot.
  2. To increase soil moisture, drag the watering can onto the pot.
  3. To increase the quality of the soil, drag the top dressing icon onto the pot.
  4. To adjust the light level or temperature, use the sliders in the lower left part of the screen.
  5. If the plant has died, it will not grow again and you will not be able to collect seeds or sell it.
  6. Drag the pruner onto the plant to remove it.
